Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza picked up three for 25 against Pakistan
Pakistan failed to chase down 130 to lose by one run
Post-Match Reflections: Sikandar Raza: 'I really, truly believe in this group of boys. Since I’ve been part of Zimbabwe cricket, I would rate that as the best victory we’ve had. There’s no better stage. This is the World Cup, the biggest stage of all.'
Babar Azam: 'Today we were not up to the mark in all three departments'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe's victory was their first Super 12 victory at the T20 World Cup
Others: Matthew Mott wants England to have attacking mindset against Australia
India thrash Netherlands, while Rossouw pummels Bangladesh
